column4: does anyone know how to set the default size of gnome-terminal without using a shell-wrapper
gemoetry works fine if you create from another window or want a shellwrapper, but when I right click in the desktop and select open terminal it would be nice to be the right size
ah, I see what you mean. not sure then, sorry ;)
thanks anyway... it should be easy to do and find, but it hasn't been so far
I wasn't talking to you, but generally you don't want to be using dapper
then you'll be perfectly ok fixing whatever problems you have yourself :)
I'll give it a try, but my question now relate to the repository
is there a more appropriate place to ask about the dapper repositories?
I don't mean to seem rude, but unsupported means unsupported. If you can't make it work, it isn't for you. That might seem harsh, but it's a development branch for developers, not curious users :/

you misunderstood my questions I'm just curious if archive.ubuntu.com is the proper place... I know about the unsupported nature... no need to apologize... just having a hard time finding out if the repo has changed
like I said, I've seen no activity in weeks
I seriously doubt it has changed
that was my thoughts... if nothing has been heard here then its something on my end... thats all I needed... thanks
